title: Hurricane Polymar
synopsis: Yoroi Takeshi is a carefree and somewhat naïve youth, who works as an assistant to the bumbling detective wannabe Kuruma Jo (who frequently proclaims himself the heir apparent to the title of Greatest Detective “Sherlock Holmes”).
staff: [['Toriumi, Hisayuki', ['Director']], ['Sasaki, Isao', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Columbia Yurikago Kai', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Ookawara, Kunio', ['Mechanical Design']]]
